login: SELECT surname FROM user WHERE email=? AND password=?
isApplicant: SELECT a_id FROM applicant WHERE u_id=(SELECT u_id FROM user WHERE email=?)
showApplicantProfile: SELECT * FROM user JOIN applicant ON user.u_id = applicant.u_id WHERE email=?
showRecruiterProfile: SELECT * FROM user JOIN recruiter ON user.u_id = recruiter.u_id WHERE email=?
registerApplicant: INSERT INTO applicant (entrydate,subject,specialization,sallery,u_id) VALUES(?,?,?,?,(SELECT u_id FROM user WHERE email=?))
registerRecruiter: INSERT INTO recruiter (position,enterprise, u_id) VALUES(?,?,(SELECT u_id FROM user WHERE email=?))
changeProfile: UPDATE bewerber_data SET userName=?, userSurname=?, email=?, userEntrydate=?, userSubject=?, userSpecialization=?, userSallery=?, user_pass=? WHERE user_id=?
